Bases: TestCase

test_Init_Except_Road()¶

Checks that Exception are correctly handled when creating a Road with valid and invalid parameters.

Returns:

Nothing

Raises:

Exception – If the Exception caused by invalid or valid values are not correctly raised

Author:

Mipam Quici

test_Init_Road()¶

Checks that the value given to the constructor are correctly set as instance variables.

Returns:

Nothing

Raises:

Exception – If the values given to the constructor are not set properly as instance variables or do not have matching values

Mipam Quici

test_Id_Not_Equals()¶

Checks that two instanced Vehicles don’t have the same id. Also checks that an instanced Road doesn’t have vehicles with same ids.

Returns:

Nothing

Raises:

Exception – If there are two vehicles with matching ids.

Author:

Clément Vellu

Raises:
